title: Beat the heat: energy efficient housing
creator_credit: Telefeatures, South Australian Film Corporation, Nicholas Cockram and Mario Andreacchio
brief_description: A film designed to show the general public how, by the use of insulation, correct orientation of a house, placement of windows, etc., the unpleasant effects of intensive summer heat can be alleviated.
